definition: to set up/to arrange/to establish/to found/to display

sentences.english: If such be Nature's holy plan.
sentences.chinese: 設若這就是大自然的神聖的旨意。

sentences.english: If they choose can be life, willing to fight a discount, less live more years.
sentences.chinese: 設若可以這樣，生命願意打個折扣，少活些年。

sentences.english: If you succeed in forcing it, very well.
sentences.chinese: 設若你能成功地強迫它，很好。

sentences.english: It's not surprising that Jinan is only full of sunshine in winter.
sentences.chinese: 設若單單是有陽光，那也算不了出奇。
